name: Iteris, Inc.
description: Iteris, Inc. is a leading technology company focused on smart transportation systems and solutions for the transportation and agriculture sectors. Founded in 1987 and headquartered in Santa Ana, California, Iteris specializes in data analytics, traffic management, and intelligent transportation systems that enhance safety, efficiency, and mobility. The company offers a wide range of products and services that include advanced traffic management systems, vehicle detection systems, and cloud-based data analytics. Iteris is committed to leveraging real-time data to improve traffic flow, reduce congestion, and enhance the overall safety of roadways. Their innovative solutions are used by transportation agencies and municipalities to optimize traffic operations and deliver actionable insights for better decision-making. Additionally, Iteris provides agricultural solutions, utilizing its expertise in data analytics to enhance farm productivity and sustainability. With a strong emphasis on innovation, Iteris continues to lead the way in developing technologies that address the growing challenges of urban mobility and agricultural efficiency, ultimately aiming to create safer and more sustainable transportation and agricultural systems.
